## DidKeyMethod.createEncryptionMethod() method

Decoding a multibase-encoded multicodec value into a verification method that is suitable for verifying that encrypted information will be received by the intended recipient.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static createEncryptionMethod(options: {
        did: string;
        enableExperimentalPublicKeyTypes: boolean;
        multibaseValue: string;
        publicKeyFormat: DidVerificationMethodType;
    }): Promise<VerificationMethod>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  options | { did: string; enableExperimentalPublicKeyTypes: boolean; multibaseValue: string; publicKeyFormat: [DidVerificationMethodType](./dids.didverificationmethodtype.md)<!-- -->; } |  |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[VerificationMethod](./dids.verificationmethod.md)<!-- -->&gt;
